name: Gull of Duty
description:
Gull of Duty is a very bad Wave Based Survival Shooter Game, Play as a Stick man riding a Seagull that's under attack by Evil Guys on Pigeons, Use your Gun and Upgrade yourself at the end of Each Wave to Survive as long as possible from the Pigeons!

Controls

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Note

This is my first proper Unity Game after 1-2 Years of Switching from GameMaker Studio 2 to Unity and was developed in 2 weeks as a Project for College

Feedback Welcome in Comments
